duties_responsibilities.duty: Learn to build and maintain positive professional relationships with drivers and safe, reliable outside carriers.
Utilize personnel management including training and orientation of drivers and/or employees.
Become proficient in maximizing efficiency of fleet operations and profitability.
Perform administrative duties such as payroll, management of the Net-Revenue budget, driver counseling, etc.
Assign loads and plan, route, and monitor freight movement to provide safe, on-time service and meet customer requirements.
Maintain the Company's safety culture to include daily driver safety messages, quarterly driver training, annual reviews, and enforce company policies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree with ability to work across multiple shifts including nights and weekends if needed
